rows.text:
We have something you can try: Following your child's lead. And the best thing about this is - you don’t need a lot of time - even 10 minutes a day makes a big difference. 

It can

text.eng:
We have something you can try: Following your child's lead. And the best thing about this is - you don’t need a lot of time - even 10 minutes a day makes a big difference. 

It can

block_1.eng: help your child feel seen and important

block_2.eng: help you to connect and relax with your child

block_3.eng: be a chance for you to step away from what causes you stress

block_4.eng: be a chance for you to take a moment to pause and play

rows.block_4: be a chance for you to take a moment to pause and play
